text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Please do. Also please close borders. Not so much that people can't get in but so they cannot run out or we truly will need to build the wall. It seems that we might beat the COVID19 but someone should start thinking how stop the stupidity pandemic that currently spread from US.
